explains: adj. 未答复的；无反应的

sentences.en: Some of the most important questions remain unanswered.
sentences.cn: 一些最重要的问题仍未被答复。

sentences.en: Many questions about the crime remain unanswered.
sentences.cn: 这桩罪行涉及的许多问题仍然没有答案。

sentences.en: The key question of what caused the leak remains unanswered.
sentences.cn: 泄漏究竟是怎么造成的，这一关键问题仍未得到答案。
